mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_myplant_statistics (myplant_seq,myplant_id, temperature, humidity, illumination, soil_moisture, sensing_time) VALUES (myplant_seq.nextval,#{myplantId}, #{temperature}, #{humidity}, #{illumination}, #{soilMoisture}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_myplant_statistics WHERE myplant_id = #{myplantId} ORDER BY sensing_time DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
